page.title: 11TRANSPT.,MEDIA,& COMMUNIC.
page.content: {TRANSPORT}_ bus from Manaccan to Helston twice a week.Mainly private cars, motor bikes etc.The nearest coach station is at Helston and railway stations are at Camborne,Redruth or Truro. Coaches are sometimes booked from a firm at Ruan Minor for private outings.Boats used to some extent. {INFORMATION}Mobile library, post office, television,locao newsletter, local noticeboard, national and local newspapers. {Media}_television,local radio (Truro), videos. {Communications}Telephone, citizens band radio, Doctors' radio,roads, footpaths.
